GlobalControl.Comment: A label displaying multiple items from a given collection with the option to switch between collapsed and expanded display mode. In collapsed mode only a certain number (i.e. the first x) of items will be displayed in addition to a "expand" link. When expanded all items will be displayed in addition to an "collapse" link.

ContainerTemplate.WhereClause:
IsExpanded() OR
primarykey() in ( from availableitems select select top CountItemsVisibleCollapsed() primarykey() order by __Display)

Label.Text: from AvailableItems select current format("{0}{1}", display(), Separator(IterationIndex(), IterationCount()))

Function.Name: IsExpanded()
Function.Comment: Determines whether the label is expanded.

Function.Name: Unquote(string text)
UsedItems()
Function.Comment: Returns the number of all items to display (when not collapsed).

Function.Name: Separator(int index, int count)

VirtualTable.Name: AvailableItems
VirtualTable.Comment: The items that are available for display. The actual items to displayed are defined (and ordered) in UIDList().

VirtualFunction.Comment: Optional: the number of items that will be displayed in collapsed mode. If not specified the default value is 3.

Optional: determines whether the label should display each item in a separate line (MuliLine=True) or all items in a single line (MultiLine=false). If not specified the default value is MultiLine=false.
Optional function that yields the tooltip to display for every single entry from AvailableItems that will be displayed.
